post:
Hi everyone,

Continuing on the success of our [LowEndBox offer](http://lowendbox.com/blog/quickpacket-49month-dual-xeon-l5420-16gb-ram-1tb-hard-drive-in-atlanta/), QuickPacket is pleased to offer our Dual Xeon L5420 out of 470 E Paces Ferry Rd NE in Atlanta, GA - now including free IP addresses up to a /24 on any of our Atlanta dedicated servers.  Justification is required.  Please contact our sales department with any questions prior to ordering.

**Dell CS24-SC - Intel Dual Xeon L5420**

* Dual Quad Core 2.5 GHz / 2x 12 MB Cache
* 16 GB RAM
* 1 TB Serial ATA Hard Drive
* 5 IP Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
* Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI (uses 1 IP address)
* 20 TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port
* Unmanaged
* Located in 470 E Paces Ferry Rd NE / Atlanta, GA

$49 per month - [Click here to Order Now!](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=100&promocode=LEBXEON) (Coupon Code **LEBXEON**)

* QuickPacket was founded in 2003 and is a registered LLC in North Carolina.
* Network providers include Hibernia, Cogent, GTT, Zayo, and peering ([AS46261](http://bgp.he.net/AS46261)).
* Ping/traceroute to 199.101.96.2. Please contact us for a test file link.
* Warez-related, Bulk Mail, and Spam-related activities are strictly forbidden.  Please review our [Terms of Service](http://www.quickpacket.com/tos.html) prior to ordering.
* We accept PayPal, VISA, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, and Bitcoin (through BitPay) payments.
* Promotional pricing is available for new customers or existing customers adding additional servers.

Thanks for your interest!
